name: RetroRunners
description:
A game by carl6005
OBS RUN THE GAME IN FULLSCREEN MODE

RetroRunners 

...is an infinite runner set in the vaporwave artstyle. This is my very first game so constructive feedback is welcome! You can download the game or just play it in the browser. Every donation goes directly to the game's development/future games.

Controls:
W/A To control the car
Left Mouse to interact with buttons
